001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JDialog;
004import javax.swing.JPanel;
005import java.awt.Color;
006import javax.swing.JLabel;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.awt.BorderLayout;
009import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
010import java.util.Set;
011import java.util.HashMap;
012
013/**
014 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
015 *
016 * @author (votre nom)
017 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
018 */
019public class TalkButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
020    private UserInterface aUI;
021    private MC aMC;
022    
023    private JDialog aDialog;
024    private JPanel aMainPanel;
025    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
026    private JPanel aPNJPanel;
027    private JPanel aPNJLabelPanel;
028    private JPanel aPNJCenterPanel;
029    
030    private JLabel aPNJLabel;
031    private JLabel aTarget;
032    
033    private Color aBGColor;
034    private Color aTextColor;
035    private Color aHoverBGColor;
036    private Color aHoverTextColor;
037    
038    private ArrayList<String> aItems;
039
040    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
041    
042    public TalkButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
043        super(pText);
044        this.aUI = pUI;
045        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
046        
047        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
048        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
049        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
050        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
051        
052        this.aPNJLabel = new JLabel("Personnages :");
053        this.aPNJLabel.setForeground(Color.white);
054        
055        this.aItems = new ArrayList<String>();
056        
057        this.addActionListener(this);
058    }
059    
060    @Override
061    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
062        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
063        this.createDialog();
064    }
065    
066    public void createDialog() {
067        this.setPossibleItems();
068        
069        this.aDialog = new JDialog(this.aUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
070        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
071        
072        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
073        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
074        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
075        
076        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
077        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
078        this.aButtonPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
079        
080        // panel avec les boutons des items
081        this.aPNJPanel = new JPanel();
082        this.aPNJPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
083        this.aPNJPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
084        
085        // panel pour le label Item
086        this.aPNJLabelPanel = new JPanel();
087        this.aPNJLabelPanel.add(this.aPNJLabel);
088        this.aPNJLabelPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
089        
090        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJLabelPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
091    
092        this.aCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
093        
094        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aCancelButton);
095        
096        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aPNJPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
097        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
098        
099        this.aPNJCenterPanel = new JPanel();
100        
101        this.addButtons();
102        
103        this.aDialog.add(aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
104        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
105        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
106        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
107        
108        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
109    }
110    
111    private void addButtons() {
112        for(String vItemName : this.aItems) {
113            this.aPNJCenterPanel.add(new TargetButton(vItemName, this.aUI, this.aDialog));
114        }
115        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
116    }
117    
118    private void setPossibleItems() {
119        this.aItems.clear();
120        for(String vItemName : GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.keySet()) {
121            if(GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(vItemName).getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aMC.getCurrentRoom()))
122                this.aItems.add(vItemName);
123        }
124    }
125    
126    public static void talkTo(final MC pMC, final PNJ pPNJ, final UserInterface pUI, final GameEngine pGE) {
127        JDialog vDialog = new JDialog(pGE.getUI().getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
128        vDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
129        
130        JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();
131        vMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
132        vMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
133        
134        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
135        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
136        vButtonPanel.setBackground(new Color(56, 51, 51));
137    
138        CancelButton vCancelButton = new CancelButton("Sortir", vDialog, pGE.getUI());
139        
140        vButtonPanel.add(vCancelButton);
141        
142        JPanel vCenterPanel = new JPanel();
143        vCenterPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(vCenterPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));
144        
145        HashMap<String, Quest> vPNJQL = pPNJ.getQuestList().getQuests();
146        HashMap<String, Quest> vMCQL = pMC.getQuestList().getQuests();
147        for(String vQName : vPNJQL.keySet()) {
148            JPanel vLinePanel = new JPanel();
149            JLabel vLabel = new JLabel(vPNJQL.get(vQName).getName() + " - ");
150            QuestButton vQButton = new QuestButton(vQName, pPNJ, pMC);
151            
152            vLinePanel.add(vLabel);
153            vLinePanel.add(vQButton);
154            
155            vCenterPanel.add(vLinePanel);
156        }
157        
158        vMainPanel.add(vCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
159        vMainPanel.add(vButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
160        
161        
162        vDialog.add(vMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
163        vDialog.setSize(500, 300);
164        vDialog.setUndecorated(true);
165        vDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
166        
167        vDialog.setVisible(true);
168    }
169}
